showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø Shower ‚Ä¶
Wow, the shower is perfect, very clean.Thank you very much
Only stopped to take a shower. They are very clean and spacious. Only thing is they only have 2 showers so you might have to wait.

Their is only two showers I waited 30 minutes for one and when I finally got one and got in their I had just got undressed and the employee used their key to unlock the door and tried to come in I‚Äôve never had this happen at any other truck ‚Ä¶
Great place to stop for the night. Cleanest showers I have seen from coast to coast. Thank you for a wonderful night rest and great morning shower
The staff was wonderful and very helpful.The store very clean . The bathroom and shower room were also very clean.The hot dogs were great and so we're the drinks
If you need the bathroom or a shower don‚Äôt stop here
Nice truck stop, clean restrooms, shower for truck drivers. Scales for weighing drivers rigs. Conviene store,  soda,  coffee, snacks. There is also a Arbys.
Another store with no way to wash laundry and don't plan on getting a shower unless you check in 2 hours early all these drivers playing with there self in shower I guess
It took more than an hour and a half for me to get the shower and there was no one waiting.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice staffs. Well maintained store, cleaned washrooms and shower. Quitly parking and plenty of spaces. Extra gravel parking on the back side.

Not the best TA I've been to but definitely some of the friendliest so far. I was kindly upgraded to a better shower free of cost and the shower was clean with fresh clean warm towels. Also, the washer and dryers work well. Good selection ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ blessed us with a smile every time she came to the table.  Then while we were waiting for our truck repair, we purchased a shower (for $16) and Michelle was so sweet! She got us into the large shower suite and we were beyond pleasantly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ dirt lot. Plenty of room for parking. Multiple dining choices with Country Pride and a Wendy's. Plenty of room for parking. Showers are a little fun down but not too bad. Super clean and spacious. I would give 5 stars but the showers need ‚Ä¶

Hands down the best TA we have ever been to . The shower attendant noticed that my husband and I were going in the shower. She immediately offered us a double shower and extra towels. The BEST SHOWER experience we have had while on the road ‚Ä¶

Best place for showers especially if you‚Äôre running with your significant other they have 2 showers with the double shower heads in the shower. Not much into the dirt parking lot though. After shower you walk outside and get dusty. The ‚Ä¶

GREAT shower. Super clean. Bat Girl(Addison?)was awesome. She made sure we had a big shower and extra towels. I give her 10 stars! Everyone at the store, restaurant and service shop was great. Keep up the good work y‚Äôall!

Super super clean shower! The store had apparently been very busy because some of the things were empty but they were quick to get them filled. The separation between Wendy's and the restaurant and the actual store is confusing not very " ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The food was always ok to sometimes good. Well today I stopped and was I surprised. I went to take a shower and it was GREAT!  It was very,very cleans,and hot water. The store was very clean and the people were extremely friendly. I ‚Ä¶

Hubby and I stopped here for the night... got fuel and parked. Went in for our shower expecting the normal but was offered a larger shower for the two of us...OMG is all I can say! It was amazing with two showers inside one long shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: No seats or bench in showers. Fans do not work. It was so hot I almost passed out. Two people get two small towels and one wash cloth. Worst of all the two women working are some hateful people. 16 dollars for the shower and I'll never stop ‚Ä¶
Nice place to grab a quick meal nice all service for truckers to come in and take a break eat shower sleep in a safe place and have a nice variety of kansas souvenirs for those coming through..

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a dirt parking lot. Food was good, people friendly. I like the country life, so it was good for me. If you want a shower, and need to do laundry. This isn't the stop for you. The only bad thing I can say. Is I'm assuming a truck ‚Ä¶

Old school truck stop good food they have showers little dated amd could use a table but nice shower pressure hot water and clean . Take a stop In and see how nice they are great place and employees will even tell you that .
Medium size parking üÖøÔ∏è lot,clean men's room, no shower üöø,small cold deli with premade sandwich s, some trucker supplies,small c-store, easy in and out. ‚Ä¶
It was a good quite stop food ok it has shower and fuel price was lower than loves and petro
The women's bathroom was being cleaned, waited 20 minutes...finally the gave us the key to the shower room and there was no tissue!!!!
It's a ok place nothing great higher prices on everything but not surprised with how owns the place and 80 gallons of fuel for a shower that's just better then nothing

showerReviews.reviewText: Currently staying here. Checked in tonight. The room is what I expected. The place is clean. The gentleman who checked me in was great! I‚Äôll be here a few days. However, I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay again if I‚Äôm ever back in town.
Great Hotel!  Check in was a breeze and the room was great!  Nice clean and vert friendly front desk!  Breakfast was pretty good!

Breakfast was amazing, room was clean and comfortable. Staff was helping. Internet superfast. I slept like a baby. Pillows are so clean & smooth. I will always stay here whenever I am in this area. Thanks for the accommodation. Pool & Spa was really  warm & hot.
Great hotel.  Very clean and Very friendly.   Stay here when you‚Äôre in Iola.  You won‚Äôt be disappointed
Staff is verry friendly and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable. I stay several times a month in this hotel for work and enjoy my stay everytime.
